website_summaries.verdict: The best budget-friendly option for locking a large amount of keys at the same time outdoors or around the home.
pros: The lock box opens from the side to accept more keys at once without taking up as much room as larger boxes
Hook is secure enough to prevent theft from most hand tools
cons: The locking hook is narrower than other models, making it more difficult to hang the lock box on thicker door handles

customer_reviews.title: Not secure with a little muscle
customer_reviews.text: Obviously this one is easy to tamper with. Now someone has my keys and my landlord doesn't want to change the locks. I wonder when I will come home and have a decent amount of my belongings gone?
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice box! But not for the security paranoid.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, sleek, easy to use. It's got everything going for except one thing: it took me less than ten minutes to figure out how to get into it without looking. With a little pressure applied correctly, it's pretty easy to feel when you've hit the right number going top to bottom. Having said that, in the real world, it's very unusual that someone will have the wits or boldness to sit at your front door and crack this thing. Still, I have to knock a star off for being so easy.
customer_reviews.author: David Earl

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless after one winter
customer_reviews.text: The lock is easy to use and probably fine as an indoor lockbox where a would-be intruder couldn't get at it for more than 20 seconds unattended. But after one winter (just a few months) outside, all the number dials fused to the box and would not rotate. A lockbox that doesn't give you your keys back when you need them is not very useful. And then to top it off, I discovered that it took all of 15-20 seconds of sawing at the loop with a hacksaw to cut through. Due to the box's design, once the loop is destroyed, the box opens right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund since I was unable to use it
customer_reviews.text: Got this because it was highly rated but would not open and have to pay for a locksmith to come. He also tried and then ended up having to drill. Got another one from Home Depot different brand and had no problems. I would like a refund since I was unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I used to leave a house key under the doormat for house keepers but realized it's not safe (duh..) and found this lockbox. I did not know there's such thing until I found it on Amazon! lol It's pretty big. Price is reasonable & it works great!
customer_reviews.author: K_Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Can be opend without knowing combonation
customer_reviews.text: While I don't have much experience with with this style of combo lock, I can say this one is trash. If you apply pressure on the shackle you can turn the combination dials around until you feel them click into place once you dial in the correct setting for each individual dial. A child could open this after being told how.
customer_reviews.author: Xerxes

customer_reviews.title: Super frustrating. A waste of money and now I ...
customer_reviews.text: I set the combination and put my key into it and then tried to open it with the code I set and it will not open. Super frustrating. A waste of money and now I need to make another key copy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline E. Michel

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t get it to work. I did exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get it to work. I did exactly what the instructions stated, watched a couple YouTube videos and still could not get lock to accept my new combination. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CHICAGOGENT

customer_reviews.title: Like a black hole
customer_reviews.text: Have something you never want to see again? Just put it in one of these, spin the dials and say goodbye forever. Seriously, this is a piece of junk but what's worse is that it's a piece of junk that swallows valuable things. I foolishly put my only copy of a key inside without a test run and then found that the combination did not work - so no more key. You're supposed to set your personal combination by swiveling the hasp back and forth in various directions with a certain heading on the compass each time but obviously this very advanced technology needs some additional work.
customer_reviews.author: samIam

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst item I ever purchased at Amazon. I read the reviews so I knew it might not be the best purchase, but I only needed to use it two times. Ready to use it for the first time and doesn’t work. At least that was before I put it in the door or put the keys inside. Worked once to change the combination but when I tried to use it- wouldn’t open. Would prefer 0 stars if an option.
customer_reviews.author: judy goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house/cat sitter.
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't have to worry about a break-in from someone "discovering" my spare key in a not-so-secret hideaway rock. It doesn't matter to me if people see the lock by my door because they still can't get into it! I live in rainy South Florida and it's been withstanding the elements beautifully. When we go on vacation we can just let our cat sitter know and we don't have to bother meeting in real life to hand over the key and they can just replace it when they leave.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K.

customer_reviews.title: not sure how strong this is
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok, but I am a little worried that the lower hinge could be pried off with a flat head screwdriver. The casing is only being held together by two short very skinny metal pins. If this is made from a hardened steel, then it might be enough, but I am afraid to test the strength of it because that would damage it.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedBrent

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy and well-built and we like knowing we can change ...
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mother recently got an emergency pendant to wear around her neck for the "I've fallen and I can't get up" scenarios. I ordered the lockbox so we could give the code to the monitoring station who could pass it on to fire/rescue personnel and not have to break down the door. We have not had to use it (yet!) but it is a relief to know its in place. It is low-profile and doesn't interfere with regular door and key operation. It seems sturdy and well-built and we like knowing we can change the combination whenever we want.
customer_reviews.author: KS Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works like a wonder
customer_reviews.text: Works like a wonder. Easy to change the code and very sturdy. Use it when we go out of town and the pet sitter comes. Easily will fit more than one key.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: This lock disfunctioned after one week, leaving my pet sitter unable to enter my apartment, causing unnecessary stress. It took less than 1 minute to use a hacksaw to cut the lock off, which should tell you something about the quality of the product. Will be returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Help! Read instructions & code wont work!
customer_reviews.text: Help! I read instructions and the lockbox locked with my key in it & won't open! I carefully set code with instructions arrggh 😣😢
customer_reviews.author: Michelle St Claire

customer_reviews.title: Large Sturdy Lock Box
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed when I received the lock box. It is bigger than it appears in the picture. It's sturdy and heavy-weighted in your hand. I feel confident that my key is safe inside. The box comes with easy to use instructions to set the four digit code.
customer_reviews.author: Sree321

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long, but it is quite heavy and feels sturdy. The combination lock is simple to reset to your own code and works smoothly. Great solution for keeping an extra key outside with an extra layer of security. I was reluctant to hide a spare key anywhere outside for fear it would be easily discovered by anyone who wanted to get in my home. But this lock box allows me to hide a key outside and still feel safe. Just what I wanted. I have already recommended it to a friend for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: homeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: I could not change the combination as instructed, and the way it's designed, the hook comes off the doorknob when the lockbox is opened. This means that it needs to be reattached when locking which is a fiddly thing to do. I would have returned the item for one of these reasons but having both made it an easy decision. Your experience may vary!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Skip this lock box
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. It opens like a clamshell and it's easy to drop the keys. Box would not stay closed. Purchased a Master Lock instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mkendall

customer_reviews.title: Still not big enough for my need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my Chevy Volt key fob while I surf. Unfortunately, it is not thick enough. I have been having difficulty finding one that will accommodate the thickness of the key and the reviews of this one noted how large it is. Otherwise it is a great design and still has more volume than most of the others while looking better. It is probably at least as secure as most, which is not saying a whole lot, but better than simply hiding a key (maybe).
customer_reviews.author: WDL

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: It is much thinner then I expected, which brings up security and durability issues. The line that the combo lines up on, has a little notch, but need to be more pronounced, white enamel paint.. it needs to be easy for ANYONE to use alone, by themselves, 1st time!! How it opens, is kinda neat, diff and fun. Maybe show a vid of how tough it is with a hammer smashing it, etc
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Well build, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller size, less bulky then other key box locks that I've owned in the past. Latch has a rubber coating to protect your door knob or wherever you're hanging the keybox. Seems sturdy and strong, but I haven't honestly taken a hammer to it to see if it will pop open if struck firmly... it does seem well built and strong. Easy to change the combination, and it uses four digits, which makes it more difficult to crack then locks with only three digits (1000 combinations vs 10,000) Plenty of room for two or three standard keys... not sure if a car keyfob would fit or not. Overall, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S in Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for condo owners
customer_reviews.text: After being out of my condo while doing laundry at six in the morning, and forgetting to grab my keys (or phone!) on the way out of my condo, having to stay in the lobby for two hours waiting for someone to “save” me, this is a lifesaver. I hang it on the door to my water heater/AC. It’s a secure feeling knowing that if I ever forget my keys again I have access to them. The lock is very simple to code and use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never be locked out of your house again
customer_reviews.text: Okay...so we have all done it right? Walked out and auto-locked the door on the way out only to have the split moment of panic because the keys are INSIDE the house??? And a hide-a-key isn't always safe. This little box gives the feeling of security in both realms. Never be locked outside of your house again....and have security in a lock box that is sturdy! It was easy to program my own code into it. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dicken

customer_reviews.title: Very good especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my front door when my dog walker comes over, etc. I do not have a regular door knob but a door lever so I was worried it would not work but decided to order it and try. The opening is just the right size that it will not come off my door handle if it is locked. These things sometimes have problems with the keys jamming them and you have to lay the key in a certain way. I haven't had any problems with this one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Calli Collins

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to use for a piece of Real Estate.  Worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: We were renting a property and needed a way for real estate agents to access the home while we were not available. This little lock worked out perfectly. Easy to set the combination, plenty of room for multiple keys (and a key ring) and it held up to the weather. No that the property is rented, we will be using this as a way to store a spare key, hidden outside.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but check the dimensions before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll give it 4 stars because it does work and seems to be sturdy. The issue I have is that the u-bolt that goes around the doorknob is much narrower than you would expect. I couldn’t get it to fit around my very standard exterior door knobs and had to resort to hiding the box on the property rather than placing around the doorknob as I wanted. Yeah it’s partially my fault for not checking the dimensions but who would assume that a product sold to fit around doorknobs doesn’t fit standard doorknobs?
customer_reviews.author: Jason Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not Teenager Proof!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if you need it for security. I used this on my bedroom door to lock away dangerous items from my teenage son I thought it was working, but all it took was my son hitting it hard at the point where the U shaped lock enters the hole & then he pried it open with downward pressure. I watched him do it. The part of the lock that hangs on the doorknob just BENT. This is not secure!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I needed to return this item, as ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I needed to return this item, as I was unable to change the combination on the lock. Not all of the dials would turn for me.
customer_reviews.author: MaryES

customer_reviews.title: Easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: This isnt as bulky as other safes on the market, but this is very easy to use and very safe, doesnt feel like anyone can just break it, I like the color to be discreet Great quality and build Shipped in an bubble wrap package Easy to set up, just use the instructions and you are set Very easy to use once you set your numbers Manual was perfectly written out
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ali

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Perfect for locking a key to the outside of my rig. We use it when we're rafting or don't want keys in our pocket. Fob doesn't fit but we just use it with a spare key. I can see many other uses. It's strong enough to prevent easy theft. No ones going to hammer it open (and good luck with that) if they can just break a window instead. It would be easier to just try all 9999 possible combinations.
customer_reviews.author: chris r

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Way to store a key
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I knew I wasn't buying Ft. Knox. So don't expect that. But, I bought it to leave a key for my kids to use in our vacation home to access our private storage room. It's a rental so we needed a way to leave a key. I have no concern that our renters will break into the lock to see what's behind door #3 thus this works for us. Super easy to reset to a number that you want (4 - digits) and we hung it on a water heater pipe for easy use. Super deal overall IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: toomanyhobbies

customer_reviews.title: Large, fits house key, long car key, and small key fob at once
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to use. I am able to fit my house key, my long car key, and a small key fob in it. The loop Fits over most metal railing, though it could be bigger. It likely wouldn’t fit on an average wooden railing, unless it’s very slender posts.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive lock box!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a lockbox that we could use at a Chalet in Port Zelande, Amsterdam so that 3 of us could use one key to get in and out of our weekend home during a music festival last March. Found a reasonably convenient place to secure the lockbox to and used it for all 3 nights we were there. It performed as hoped and expected. It was worth the price I paid. The storage compartment was reasonably large, and fit out overszed key easily!! Overall, very pleased and would recommend this lockbox!
customer_reviews.author: Myron J. Grubaugh

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I’m a single lady living in an apartment building. I’m always so worried I’ll lock myself out. Well, it took a year, but I ended up doing just that. Thank god my friend in the building still had my key from watching my cat, and her roommate was home to get it for me. So I decided to get a lockbox, and now my worries are over. I have it locked on the door knocker. Perfect. (deep exhale...lol)
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to recommend this quality product. Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the near-perfect replacement for a much older item that was not nearly as sturdy. It appears to be very durable, and hopefully as resistant to outdoor conditions as it claims. Setting the new code was quite simple when following the instructions. I don’t use mine on a door knob (is hidden elsewhere), but since that is the design intent, I’m certain everyone will be pleased with the normal hanging method. I would easily order this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Don Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Seller:  Kingsley Security
customer_reviews.text: There were several lockbox products to choose from. I liked the ease of using the Kingsley Guard-A-Key Black Realtor's Lockbox. The video on how to set it up was very helpful for me. The lockbox is in place and the feeling of security for my elderly mother and for me is worth every penny. My order was received in excellent condition and on time. I had no reason to contact the Seller. I am a very satisfied customer. Thank you. JG
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Does what I want it to do
customer_reviews.text: I got the unit. Read the directions. Set the combination, and put the key in. This is so contractors can let themselves in and out on a house I will be moving into. In reading some of the reviews, I'm not too worried about people breaking in. This is a neighborhood and it would look weird if someone was fiddling for a while trying to get in. For me it was simple, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jackson

customer_reviews.title: wors Well; Easy to use Design
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed lock box and look the part. The black color when placed on a black door makes it difficult to spot by someone passing by. Instructions are fine. When setting the combination you must be sure that the numbers line up exactly. It takes a few uses before it get easy. I use it for those days when I am out of the house and a home health aide visits to care for my spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Ramil C. Wright

customer_reviews.title: not fun when you live alone and have to wait for ...
customer_reviews.text: I tend to lock myself out of the house on a regular basis...not fun when you live alone and have to wait for a friend to come bring you the spare key. This has saved me three times from myself already.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marie

customer_reviews.title: Much Safer than the key under the flowerpot :)
customer_reviews.text: Relatively new to this product so don't know how it will stand the test of weather. After locking myself out and needing to go to my office to get the spare key in my desk I needed a different solution. Didn't want to leave an unsecured key around where it could be found and used by an unauthorized person. This is a great solution. I locked it to a water feed so it's secure. Was easily able to set a personalized code and it has room for my house key plus others. It seems easier to open than a traditional realtors lockbox. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, continuous daily outdoor use for 8 months with no problems
customer_reviews.text: We have left this lockbox outside for the last 8 months (rain, heat, snow) with no problems. We have pet sitters that come and walk our dog every day and even though it has been left outside exposed for 8 months and daily locking/unlocking, it still works great. Love that you can change the combination at will, as we rotate through our pet sitters often when they graduate or move away. It has a very small compartment, but it fits our key with an attached carabiner snugly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yamazaki

customer_reviews.title: Slim profile; secure design.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to my Master Lock lockbox, when I realized that the Master Lock version I had was not a secure combo lock box; the Master Lock version had a button design, vs dials, and as long as you pressed the correct buttons--regardless of order or how many times the button was pressed--the lock would open. This version by Kingsley, however, is a true combination lock, meaning there are far more combinations someone would have to try in order to open this (assuming that inputting the correct code is the only way to open the lockbox). I also like the slim profile, which can make the lockbox less noticeable at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Dash Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more?
customer_reviews.text: Some say that this lock isn't as "durable" as other, larger, more expensive locks. I say, phooey!! It hold the keys for my real estate operations just fine. Furthermore, if someone wants to take a sledge-hammer to a lock, they are going to get into the building...without using the keys. This is a great lock, much less expensive than a lot of the other options out there, does the job, is easy to use, and stands up to being outside. All going points. I bought one... needed more, now I have four... we see what the future brings, but I think I have food feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Once the few contractors figured out where to line up the numbers, it works great. . . just what I needed. Probably not the most secure thing on the market but the windows are easier to break in than this little lock box. Probable could do with a more delineated line but seriously, if the contractor can't figure out how to open a lockbox, I don't want him working on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying this lockbox because now it's a known quantity. Is it waterproof? I wouldn't bet on that, but I don't use it for that. Is it small? Yes, there is only room for 2-3 keys in there and the smallest keyring with a label. But, it gets the job done and is quite affordable, and easy to use. I have about 8 of these in circulation at any given time.
customer_reviews.author: tangelo17

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergencies, school aged kids, and getting locked out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so my teenagers could let themselves in the house after school. I was afraid of keys getting lost. BUT...I’ve used it when I got locked out. I learned about this from a friend who has a chronic illness. She has one on her door and has provided the code to her emergency contacts and fire and rescue. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use live slim feature
customer_reviews.text: My elderly mom has a life line to call emergency if she falls. This lock holds a key that is hung on the outside of her door. The emergency responders are given the code and will not have to break down her door. The slim feature allows it to fit between her door and screen. It is easy to use. Only reason not given five stars is just purchased and want to see longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Shani R. Hustad

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price except that Realtors couldn't operate without the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I could use it but unfortunately so many Realtors left our front door unlocked because they couldn't figure it out :( You don't need too much smarts to operate it, but need a simpler one for these people perhaps due to their rush or lack of patience. Great for the price except that several others couldn't operate without the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: amf

customer_reviews.title: Buy this BEFORE you lock your keys inside your house!
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered that locking your house keys inside your house without a back up set is extremely stressful and very expensive to get back inside! This lovely little item should help protect us from that happening again. It locks and unlocks very easily and there's plenty of room inside for several keys. Changing the combination is so easy. I wish we had inivested in this item long before the lock-out happened, but live and learn!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson in GRMI

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for surfers who don’t want to bring a key in their wetsuit. Not the most weather proof option, some of the lock dials are getting corroded. Most people probably just think it’s a lock and have no idea the key is in it. Recommended it to a friend who uses it for the same thing as well. Overall pretty happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sj0rgensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use... and nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs (leaving keys for Airbnb guests) and so easy to use! The price was definitely right, so I took a chance on this combination lock...so glad I did. Either instructions didn’t come with it OR, more likely, I accidentally tossed them. But a quick glance at this product’s Amazon page told me how to 1) open the lock and 2) set a new code. Super easy and I’m glad to look slightly more professional with this lock than just hiding the keys under a mat or something, as I’d originally planned!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Peelout

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: The key lock is great! It’s sturdy, easy to set and use and I think it looks nicer than a lot of options out there. I actually use it to keep an extra set of keys in my garage safely in case I lock myself out of my house which I do more often than I’d like to admit. I didn’t feel safe just hiding them so this offered a nice solution.
customer_reviews.author: Novamom

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock box, great value
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have pointed out, this is not a high security lock box. I feel like if someone wanted to smash/pry their way in, this box probably wouldn't hold up. However, as a slim, easy to use option for key access control, it's a great value. I wanted something with a combination lock to use as a master for several keyed padlocks. This works nicely for that. There's not a lot of room inside, but I was able to fit 3 padlock keys with key tags inside easily. Only took about 30 seconds to customize the combination. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mbgoss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for housecleaning service
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using a hide-a-key and it is very simple to set up and use! I had no trouble setting it up, and my housecleaner had no trouble using it and resetting the key. I was concerned it would only attach to handle-style doorknobs and not the round-style doorknobs that I have but it works with both, no problem! It is also easy to reset the code if you so choose.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Slim profile, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this lock. I got it to prevent accidental lock outs and for the convenience of having an accessible spare key. I was concerned with the security of the keys, the size and appearance of the lock box. First it was easy to set my new combination. The lock is attractive, has a slim profile.
customer_reviews.author: R Sticklee

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a covered porch so can't really address how weatherproof it is. Is seems suitably secure and is certainly easy to use. I needed to give an out of town friend access to my home while I was away on business. For the price, this was just what I needed and it worked beautifully. I arrived promptly. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastProvelFan

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.  Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is much larger than it appears in the pictures, but that's a good thing! It seems really solid and sturdy and was easy to program. So far it's been easy for realtors to get in and out of as well. I placed it on the water spigot in front of my house so it's not in plain view on the front door. I'd use it again if I ever sell another house.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: It's cost me several hundred dollars in lock replacements
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time today- left it chained to an iron grate at the front of my apartment building for the dog walker to come and get the keys in the evening. Well guess what? Dog walker showed up and no lock box. Someone was able to either break or unlock this in just one afternoon. And now I get to spend several hundred dollars getting new locks, and also miss out on work and not get paid. So I'd say this was overall a poor investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to set code
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lock to use on a rental property in between tenants. It is smaller and more compact than other lock boxes I’ve used, which is nice. It was easy to reset the code and has ample room for keys. It is a bit tight to attach over a standard doorknob, and needs to be positioned just right to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: MsOhio

customer_reviews.title: Great and super slim
customer_reviews.text: This was a very great value and super slim, not a bulky item like others. Super elegant and even though the instructions were not easy to follow I found a video online and it was a piece of cake to set up. Super happy about my lock. Black NOT too flashy and like I say elegant and super slim and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Duch

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy enough to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy enough to use. Downsides are a very limited storage compartment (maybe 2-3 keys max) and people often mistake it for a padlock and can't figure out that it opens from the side. This has been a bit of an issue with people that show up looking for a standard "lockbox" and call saying they can only find the "padlock" on the door. Maybe some additional markings for the mechanically impaired would improve it to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations by a mile, wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Living alone out in the country, I have always worried about that moment of accidentally locking myself out. This keybox is great. It is secure, holds all the keys I need to get back into my house, and I have secured it in a place where nobody will ever think to look. I have now lowered my anxiety by several levels. Thank you Kingsley
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rushing

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it was very easy to use. Seems very sturdy. Can't say how well it stands up to the weather yet. We'll see. I live in Florida where the weather can be brutal. If you've ever locked yourself out of your home you know that frustration. Was able to conceal it behind the bushes around the water spigot. Guess this would be good If you were having a friend check on your home when you're not there and then just change the combo.
customer_reviews.author: CLV

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. The shackle wouldn't lock after changing the combination. I fiddled with it for a half an hour, reread all the instructions, etc., but no good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set your own code. Comes with easy to follow instructions. My own complaint is that it’s rather thin, it would be hard to fit anymore than two standard keys. A car key-fob would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Fiveappleteacher

customer_reviews.title: Some might work and some might not
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t set my own code. I read tons of reviews as well as the directions and watched a few YouTube videos & copied exactly what the were doing... and nothing but 0000 would work. Very frustrating... I’m sending it back. Update... I sent it back and got another one in just a few days. The new one worked on the 1st try setting the code. If the 1st one would have worked then I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: it's been great and SUPER convenient
customer_reviews.text: Kept it at my parents house locked on their banister since a lot of real estate agents wanted to show an apartment in our 3 family home sometimes during the day it was difficult. So I set this up, would text the RE agents the passcode and so far for 3 days, it's been great and SUPER convenient. I just plan to go back every few days and make sure the key is there and change the passcode again. The instructions were SUPER user friendly and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina H

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty, but good enough
customer_reviews.text: The product has enough room for key with a plastic key tag. Once I figured out how to use it, thanks to a Youtube video, it was very easy to use. Not heavy-weight, but lighter. Convenient for allowing people in with a combination, which would be very easy to change for repeated use by many people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: Add a few more features....then you are the best!
customer_reviews.text: 1. I wish you cover the dials to make it like a regular padlock. 2. I wish the shackle can be kept lock separately and should not unhook when the key compartment is unlocked. So the lock will be kept hanging locked when the compartment is unlocked. **I love your design slim, light and simple.
customer_reviews.author: ddt2d

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and sometimes lock yourself out of your apartment, this is a great option to keep a set of spare keys in. You can lock it on the fence next to your neighbors' Wag walkers' key locks and it won't be a noticeable nuisance or look out of place. Good to have for your own peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, manufacturer did not send replacement as promised
customer_reviews.text: 1) Appeared to work when I tried the first time. Once I put the key inside and locked it, the combo would not open it at all. it locked up. Had to take a sledgehammer to get the key out!! 2) they said they would send a free replacement. I am still waiting a month later 3) I had to rush to the local hardware to and spend $50 to buy a different kind that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Californian

customer_reviews.title: Good product for small item need
customer_reviews.text: I chose this lock for its size. Other key holder locks were very large and bulky. This one won't hold a key fob auto key but holds std keys well. Resetting the combination was fairly easy, but I needed to sit with the lock to walk through the instructions, but then was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: acl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, priced right!
customer_reviews.text: The pet sitting service that I work for uses these with lots of clients, so I know that they stand up well after months of all kinds of weather. I got a new one for my house after giving mine to a client. Easy to set the code and the clasp is big enough you can attach it to a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: MaryNC

customer_reviews.title: Great for Surfing
customer_reviews.text: Previously bought a different product, but it wouldn't fit my key. This is big enough to fit my key in it while I'm out surfing. Then when I get back I know it's right where I left it. Too many friends stashed a key only to find their stuff ripped off when they got back. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Libspike

customer_reviews.title: Get's the Job Done, Hopefully
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little flimsy for a security device. That's a personal preference type criticism as the locking bolt appears fine. I'm not about to test the steel with bolt cutters but if you aren't living in an area known for bold burglars this should be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Could not set the combination lock following enclosed instructions. Other than that problem, item is questionable as to what security it provides. It seems light and easily opened with a hammer/crowbar. Of course you get what you pay for. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: VooDooDoll

customer_reviews.title: Good design with one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to secure a bin to keep forensic nursing supplies in. It's a great design, but when unlocking and attempting to relock, if the arm is turned the wrong way, it will not lock. I struggled with it for some time before I realized the issue. I ended up getting a different lockbox for our team's supplies, though I like this lock very much. If you are using this for yourself, then go for it. If you have a bunch of people using it, there will be issues with relocking.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: A bit counterintuitive to use but good price
customer_reviews.text: The lock box definitely works so I can't fault it. However, I usually have to explain to my dog walkers how to use it because the combination needs to be lined up to unlock AND to lock. It doesn't have the same satisfying click as a padlock because the metal loop doesn't go down into the box. Other than that it works great and I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Returned because you can't set the combination
customer_reviews.text: I set the combination 4-5 times on this thing and it never "took." And that was after I found out that I couldn't even set it by hand -- the mechanism jams up so tightly when it's in the setting position that I legit had to use a small wrench to turn the dials. Bonus: it didn't even come with instructions
customer_reviews.author: jthx

customer_reviews.title: Lockbox
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews about this being difficult to open/re-number, but I've had no issues, and it works for what I need it for. There's room for several loose keys or 1 with a keychain.
customer_reviews.author: angel_xtreme

customer_reviews.title: Good size, made well.  Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this lockbox. Its bigger than it looks but not big like the ones you often see. Its heavy and well made. Very indiscreet. I chose to put mine on my porch chair in a place that is not noticeable instead of putting it on the door. The door is white and this would stand out to people driving by and I figured why make it noticeable. Haven't needed to use it yet but my house cleaning service is now requiring these instead of being responsible for everyone's keys. It also solves the problem of me locking myself out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a hide-a-key, but shackle is a bit thick
customer_reviews.text: this was the perfect solution, as I needed both a padlock and a place to store an extra key. Taking off on star because the shackle is so thick, it just barely fits the clasp on my storage locker. it's not a heavy duty lock, so not sure why they put such a thick shackle on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the way these open. You are pretty much removing the lock to open it. It is hard to figure out how to open it also so if you are a Realtor putting it on the house you will probably get a lot of calls of people not being able to get in. The space is not very big for keys so if there is a lot of keys needed for buildings this will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Slim design best for a single key.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this it seems sturdy enough slim design. But it was out just one day and already showing rust on the latch. Also using it for 2 medeco keys on a slip key ring and it barely fits. Like you have to juggle it just right to get them in there. First time it took me 10 mins. This is best for a single key. In the photo I added a red sticker FYI. Most likely would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Difficult to Operate
customer_reviews.text: It works and is cheaper than others I have seen, but it is a bit difficult to use. My wife uses it for her real estate business, and says that is harder to operate than her other (more expensive) one. It hinges open instead of having a door for the key, and it takes extra time (especially when it's cold outside).
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Kantar

customer_reviews.title: Big, but works
customer_reviews.text: It's always hard to picture dimensions in your head, but this item is larger in person than it might seem in the images. It does the job just fine for the price, though. It would be no match for any decent crow-bar, however.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine the few times we needed to use it
customer_reviews.text: We were doing a remodel on a remote property of ours and didn't want to drive out to let the trades in every morning. This is exactly what we needed. Easy to set up and easy to open/ relock. Can't say about it's weatherproof properties or its security features except it seemed like it would be on fine on an exposed area.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change combination
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for the day care workers that take care of my mother. We have had to change it each time they send a new person out. It is easy to show them how to use and change the combination on. Ours is on our front door without a screen door but protected from most weather by covered porch. Room for multiple keys
customer_reviews.author: Labmom12

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little lock box
customer_reviews.text: As of now, I am giving this 4 stars because I think its a great design. It just lacks one thing; a seal. If it keeps the water out without a seal, I will give i 5 stars. If I planned on using it jn a dry location, it would have been 5 stars for sure. If it holds up, we may use it for our real estate firm.
customer_reviews.author: MikeDaytona675

customer_reviews.title: The lockbox won't close
customer_reviews.text: Used this successfully few times. After a month or so, tried to close the lockbox after taking out the key. It won't close. Nothing I tried worked. Googled this issue and it seems to be an issue many people face. The company has no help page to solve this problem. Would buy something else, not this.
customer_reviews.author: thinkingtubelite

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lock to have if it is left in a safe and secure place. I however left it somewhere that allowed someone to take a hammer or a rock to it and it seems to have popped right open. So if you are looking for true security, maybe go with a thicker and stronger lock. I had to replace all my locks after this. It would have just been cheaper to invest in a more expensive and strong lock.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Katzdale

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a lockbox for spare keys outside of my apartment building. It probably isn't the strongest lockbox out there, but it was the right price for my needs. It easily fits three standard keys on a small key ring. The combo was very easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: STOP!  Look no further.  This LB and no. of keys it'll hold, plus price:. The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! Did I say, PERFECT!!! The specs and description =. Spot on. Nice, easy, holds more than a couple keys, set up instructions, easy, easy, and, easy. If you're looking for a ' Fort Knox Vault' type for that 10K diamond...you may want to reconsider, unless that diamond, a zircon. If the answer is, yes! Well, this LB is the one. You might want to put that zircon in a velvet bag, too. Not to worry, it'll fit. Great LB for the $. A Big, SUMMA CUM LAUDE along with those, 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: The first one repeatedly worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The first one repeatedly worked like a charm. The second one I was unable to lock after initially unlocking; even after trying over a dozen times, closely following the directions, and watching two YouTube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easily hidden
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this lock to hide my spare key. Not very easy to do living in an apartment complex. The lock is nice and thin. Has space for a about 4-5 keys. The nice black color and design makes it easy to blend in behind rails and exterior lighting. Set up was easy and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mario S., Farias

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a means to let employees into an office space when no one was there off shift. It has been perfect for us. Super easy to use and size is perfect. Super easy to change the code any time you want. It has been exactly what we needed and super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Belden

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The key box is slim and sturdy, and much easier to use than the common Master Lock equivalent, which often requires repositioning the keys multiple times so that the thing will close. When I had trouble setting my combination, Max from Kingsley customer service replied promptly via email and helped me solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: jkittrell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. It fits my two keys in it and fits around my doorknob. I was afraid at first that it would come off but it's nice and tight. The mechanism for the combination is easy to move around and it unzips easily when combo is successful.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,875 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
